name: hoga
description: A blank template to get started with Payload 3.0

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --max-old-space-size=4096" payload generate:importmap && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --max-old-space-size=4096" next build
scripts.build:dev: infisical run --env=dev -- cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --max-old-space-size=4096" next build
scripts.build:vercel: pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --max-old-space-size=4096" payload generate:importmap:ci && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --max-old-space-size=4096" next build
scripts.dev: infisical run --env=staging -- cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation next dev
scripts.dev:prod: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation rm -rf .next && pnpm build && pnpm start
scripts.generate:importmap: infisical run --env=staging -- cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation payload generate:importmap
scripts.reinstall: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation rm -rf node_modules && rm pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm --ignore-workspace install
scripts.start:dev: infisical run --env=dev -- cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation next start
scripts.test: pnpm run test:unit && pnpm run test:int && pnpm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: infisical run --env=dev -- cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation vitest run --config ./vitest.config.mts tests/unit/
scripts.test:e2e: infisical run --env=dev -- cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--no-deprecation --no-experimental-strip-types" pnpm exec playwright test --config=playwright.config.ts
scripts.test:int: infisical run --env=dev -- cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation vitest run --config ./vitest.config.mts tests/int/
scripts.types: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation rm -rf payload-types.ts && payload generate:types
